message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose a lower price of $7500.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm proposing a new price of $8500. I believe this is a fair compromise, considering the value of the product.
